abomination.title: Abomination
abomination.name: Bigby
abomination.description: A tormented shapeshifter cursed with eldritch powers. Bigby struggles to control the monstrous force within him, oscillating between his human form and a terrifying bestial transformation. His tragic past and internal conflict make him a dangerous but potentially powerful ally.
abomination.history: Beaten, branded, and imprisoned for untold decades, Bigby eventually escaped his confinement. He carries the burden of an eldritch curse that gives him immense power at a terrible cost. The scars of his imprisonment and the constant battle with his inner demon have shaped him into a conflicted and dangerous individual.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: None
clothing.accessories: Chains wrapped around torso and arms

strengths: Immense physical strength in beast form

notes: Speaks in a surprisingly soft, gentle voice
Never uses profanity and visibly winces when others take the Lord's name in vain
His constant slouching undermines his true height
Meticulously folds and arranges his few possessions

antiquarian.title: Antiquarian
antiquarian.name: Josephine
antiquarian.description: The Antiquarian is a cunning and morally ambiguous character driven by an insatiable greed for valuable artifacts and occult knowledge. Her pursuit of power and wealth leads her to dark places, both literally and figuratively. She has arrived at the estate to pilfer the Ancestor's relics, and in search of the final piece of a mysterious puzzle box.
antiquarian.history: Originally from the deserts around the Levantine Sultanate, the Antiquarian has traveled the world trading in supernatural relics. She became a disciple to a sorcerer to advance her knowledge of the arcane, only to betray and imprison him in a censer during a ritual. Her past is marked by self-serving decisions and a willingness to sacrifice others for her goals.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Blue bandana
clothing.accessories: Red scarf covering lower face, multiple necklaces

notes: Speaks multiple languages fluently, including Levantine and the language of the Eastern isles
Whispers to her censer during moments of stress; the trapped sorcerer within responds with venomous, hateful mutterings
Instinctively touches objects, or their closest representative, while speaking about them
Surrounds herself with fragrant vapours from the censer, to protect her sensitive nose
Meticulously maintains her hair's cleanliness

arbalest.title: Arbalest
arbalest.name: Missandei
arbalest.description: A skilled crossbowwoman with a tragic past, the Arbalest is a survivor who has honed her skills with the arbalest through years of hardship and adventure. Her quest for wealth is driven by a deeper search for a home she may never find.
arbalest.history: After a violent attack on her home that killed her father, the Arbalest was forced to flee with only a crossbow for protection. She has since traveled widely, serving as a mercenary, and has developed exceptional skills with her weapon and knowledge of herbal medicine.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.hairStyle: Dreads tied up in a short upright ponytail

clothing.head: White headband
clothing.accessories: Gauntlet on one hand and glove on the other

notes: Carries her 'Childhood tresure', an old stuffed bunny
Her Crossbow's name is 'Millicent'
Can identify dozens of bird species by their calls alone
Reserves her signature confident smirk exclusively for the moment when victory becomes inevitable in her mind
Secretly yearns to be seen as a woman, not just a reliable marksman and medic

bounty_hunter.title: Bounty Hunter
bounty_hunter.name: Tardif
bounty_hunter.description: A ruthless and professional bounty hunter who takes pride in his work. The Bounty Hunter is a skilled fighter, motivated primarily by profit and self-interest. His cynical worldview and loner tendencies suggest a dark past that he refuses to talk about.
bounty_hunter.history: While his past is a well-guarded secret, The Bounty Hunter has clearly lived a life of violence and danger. He's honed his skills as a bounty hunter, becoming a calculated and efficient killer who specializes in identifying weak points and executing targets.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Metallic mask with cloth covering face

notes: Responds with a dismissive snort to questions he deems unworthy of verbal answers
Refuses to remove his mask in any circumstance
Speaks in terse, short sentences
Records debts and favors in a small, weathered notebook, crossing them off with satisfaction when settled
Keeps meticulous tallies of kills, contracts, and earnings

cataphract.title: Cataphract
cataphract.name: Nyriad
cataphract.description: The Cataphract is a formidable mounted warrior from the Levantine Sultanate, bonded with the spirit of her horse, Kargadaan, whose skull she always carries around. In battle, it transforms into a spectral steed of blue flames to assist the Cataphract. Together they form an unstoppable cavalry unit, using their combined skills to charge into battle and vanquish foes.
cataphract.history: Once a respected warrior of the Levantine Sultanate, the Cataphract's life changed when her beloved Kargadaan was fatally wounded. Desperate, she stole a powerful artifact to revive him, resulting in their exile. Now the spirit of the horse speaks to her, and they fight together against the horrors of the estate.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Angular facial structure and prominent cheekbones

notes: Regularly converses with Kargadaan's skull, though no one else can hear it
Speaks with a mild Levantine accent, which becomes more pronounced when excited or angry
Maintains rigid military discipline, and is disappointed when she finds others' lacking
Under extreme stress, her identity fractures as she begins speaking and acting as though she were Kargadaan
Forms immediate judgments of others and stubbornly sticks to them

cook.title: Itinerant Cook
cook.name: Gertrude
cook.description: The Itinerant Cook is an elderly, but strong woman. She is an experienced and world-wise traveling cook. Pragmatic and sometimes cynical, she excels in her culinary skills and firmly believes in the power of good food. She's resourceful, adaptable, and has faced numerous challenges in her long life.
cook.history: The Itinerant Cook has spent her life working across a wide range of settings from high-end kitchens to makeshift camp setups. Her travels have exposed her to diverse and often dangerous situations, which she has consistently survived. She has a dark side to her expertise, including knowledge of luring and slaughtering both beasts and people.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: White eyebrows, age lines, defined cheekbones

clothing.head: Goggles
clothing.accessories: Red sash, Necklace with pendant, Enormous backpack

notes: Has developed a disturbing taste, casually consuming raw specimens that make others retch
Refuses to reveal the contents of her 'secret ingredient' vial
Insists companions eat more than they want, firmly believing undereating is more dangerous than overeating
Age has dulled her eyesight, requiring her to work primarily by touch and smell when preparing food
Always talks of surviving hardships, but quietly harbors a deep fear of dying alone

crusader.title: Crusader
crusader.name: Reynauld
crusader.description: Once a simple farmer who joined the war to save his family from famine, Reynauld rose unexpectedly through martial prowess to become a legendary commander. The horrors he witnessed and his own transformation into a hardened warrior left him unable to return to his former life. His peculiar habit of collecting trinkets from fallen enemies and his distinctive whistling became well-known among his men. Now drawn to the Estate, he seeks not holy war but a deeper purpose in combating forces that threaten the very fabric of humanity.
crusader.history: Born to till the soil, Reynauld lived a peaceful life with his wife and young son until famine threatened their survival. He joined the army as a conscript, leaving behind promises of return. His natural leadership and battlefield courage saw him rise from farmer to feared commander. In a pivotal moment, he spared The Warlord, recognizing the futility of endless conflict. This act, coupled with his growing disillusionment, led him to abandon both the war and thoughts of returning home, knowing he could no longer fit into that simple life.
crusader.summary: A stalwart and inspiring former farmer turned legendary Crusader, haunted by war, who struggles with kleptomanic tendencies and a conflicted past.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

clothing.head: Steel helm
clothing.accessories: Purple tunic with a white cross

crusader.magic: The light, a divine power that lets him smite foes and heal allies
notes: Has kleptomanic tendencies that he tries to hide
Does a characteristic whistle after nabbing something, or when otherwise pleased with himself
Writes letters to his family that he never sends
Wears simple farmer's clothes when out of his armor

heiress.description: The crusader maintains a professional relationship with the heiress, focusing on fulfilling his role as her protector with a devout sense of duty.

kheir.description: While the crusader intends to uphold his duty with silent diligence, he realizes the meek Heir is unfit to lead.

highwayman.description: The crusader sees in the highwayman a kindred spirit; both men with troubled pasts seeking to carve out a purpose through the quest they now share.

seraph.description: The Crusader served under the Seraph after her miraculous transformation, awed by her divine presence and inspired by her holy purpose. Her burned visage and manifest powers were proof of the Light's grace, making his role in her crusade feel truly righteous.

curator.title: Curator
curator.name: Blathers
curator.description: A fastidious academic and lifelong scholar, the Curator has been drawn to the Estate by an insatiable curiosity for its unique and forgotten relics. His keen eye can spot value where others see only ruin, but his vast knowledge is tempered by his physical frailty. While he can support his allies with sharp analysis, his academic condescension and obsessive need to collect artifacts often clash with the brutal reality of combat.
curator.history: Having spent his life in the quiet halls of museums, the Curator's world was upended by tales of impossible artifacts emerging from the Estate. Unable to resist the call of such a historical enigma, he journeyed to the hamlet not as a warrior, but as a researcher on the ultimate field expedition. His goal is to document and preserve the treasures of this land before they are lost to the encroaching darkness, a task for which he will risk life and limb—preferably someone else's.
curator.summary: A curious and physically frail Curator, whose academic snobbery and obsessive need to collect artifacts clash with the brutal reality of the Estate.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

clothing.head: Monocle
clothing.body: Proper suit with a ruff collar

notes: Used to working long 'night shifts' in his museum, he has a higher tolerance for staying awake.
Obsessively cleans his monocle, especially after a messy encounter.
Views combat through an academic lens, often muttering about 'improper technique' or 'fascinating anatomy'.
Despite his fascination with eldritch artifacts, he is secretly terrified of common insects and vermin.

duchess.title: Duchess
duchess.name: Constance
duchess.description: A noblewoman turned monster, the Duchess is a formidable fencer who has embraced the Crimson Curse inflicted upon her by the Countess. She now seeks vengeance against the curse-inflicted court, particularly the Countess, while finding an uneasy alliance with the Heirs and fighters of the Hamlet.
duchess.history: Born into nobility, Constance lived a life of luxury and became the court's finest fencer. She developed a rivalry with the Countess, who later disappeared for years. Upon receiving an invitation to a party in the Ancestor's courtyard along with a chalice of blood, Constance became infected with the Crimson Curse. Now transformed, she seeks revenge against the Baron, the Viscount, and especially the Countess.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Large, angular helmet that hides everything but her toothy mouth
clothing.legs: Tattered dress reinforced with metal plates

notes: Maintains an aristocratic air, insisting on comforts befitting her station
Treats her hunger with dark humor, often joking about eating her allies
Speaks with with sardonic wit and cutting remarks
Views her human allies as temporary tools in her vendetta

kheir.description: In her brief early encounters with the Heir, the Duchess found his adoration amusing but ultimately inconsequential. His fumbling attempts to court her were quickly forgotten.

heiress.description: The Duchess barely remembers the Heiress, save for the latter's penchant for lurking at the edges of courtly gatherings. To the Duchess, the young Heiress was an unremarkable presence.

hqclaimants.description: The fading influence of the scheming the Claimants served only as a backdrop to the Duchess' greater rivalry with the Countess.

flagellant.title: Flagellant
flagellant.name: Damien
flagellant.description: A zealous devotee who finds power and religious ecstasy through self-inflicted pain. Once a vagrant, Damien discovered his calling after a violent encounter, leading him to dedicate his life to suffering as a form of worship and atonement.
flagellant.history: Formerly a destitute wanderer in the city, Damien's life changed when he was attacked by drunks. The pain awakened a fervent religious conviction within him, leading him to join the clergy and later seek out suffering as a form of spiritual enlightenment.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Pronounced lips and chin, scars on his back

notes: Speaks in a mix of improvised religious doctrine and fragments of actual scripture
Views his scarred flesh as 'The Testament' - a living document of his devotion to the Light
Refers to his flail as 'The Burden'
Becomes more powerful the closer he is to death

vestal.description: The Flagellant sees the Vestal as someone who fled her divine retribution, rejecting the sacred suffering he holds dear. Her strength intrigues him, but her defiance fills him with scorn and pity.

grave_robber.title: Grave Robber
grave_robber.name: Audrey
grave_robber.description: Once a noblewoman, the Grave Robber turned to grave robbing after murdering her abusive husband. She's a skilled assassin, specializing in quick, precise attacks and evading danger. Her past has left her with a cynical outlook, but she's found a new purpose in her dangerous profession.
grave_robber.history: Born into wealth and married for status, the Grave Robber endured years of abuse from her drunken, lustful husband. She eventually poisoned him, then robbed his grave to maintain her lifestyle. When faced with eviction due to debt, she fully embraced her new identity as a grave robber and fled her former life.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Mole on upper lip, pointy chin

clothing.head: Wide-brimmed hat
clothing.body: Blue fitted jacket with puffy shoulders

notes: Maintains an aristocratic air, distinguishing between herself and 'the rabble'
Frequently critiques the 'cheapness' of items
Has a gallows sense of humor
Has a beautiful singing voice but very rarely sings

greymane.title: Cursed
greymane.name: Genn Greymane
greymane.description: The proud and tragic King of Gilneas, the Cursed is a man defined by his failures and his unbreakable will to atone. He wields the very lycanthropic curse that ruined his kingdom as a weapon, shifting between a pragmatic human commander and a ferocious Worgen beast. Driven by the ghosts of his past, he has come to the Estate to prove that even a fallen king can still protect his people and carve out a future from ruin.
greymane.history: Once an arrogant and isolationist ruler, the Cursed's pride led to the downfall of his kingdom, Gilneas. In a desperate act to defend his walled-off nation, he unleashed the Worgen curse, only to see it infect him and his people, costing him his son and his throne. Now a king without a country, he is haunted by his choices and seeks not conquest, but redemption, fighting to restore the honor of his name and the future of the Gilnean people.
greymane.summary: A proud and tragic cursed king who wields his monstrous form as a weapon, haunted by past failures and driven by a desperate need for atonement.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

appearance.features: Full white beard and mutton chops, sharp facial scars

greymane.magic: The Worgen Curse, allowing him to shapeshift at will between his human and bestial forms.
notes: Haunted by the memory of his lost son, Liam, and the fall of his kingdom.
Maintains rigid control over his Worgen form, but the scent of blood can agitate his inner beast.
Carries immense guilt over his past pride and isolationism, which he now views as the cause of his people's suffering.
Has a grim, cynical sense of humor, often joking about his own curse.

heiress.title: Heiress
heiress.name: Persephone
heiress.description: The Heiress to the accursed Estate, excels at taking command in even the most daunting situations. With her sharp intellect and strategic prowess, she fearlessly leads the charge to reclaim her ancestral home while deftly managing the nearby hamlet. Her natural authority and decisive leadership serve as a beacon of strength for a community besieged by supernatural horrors. Though grateful for allies brave enough to join her cause, Persephone's unwavering confidence in her own judgment can manifest as stubborn resistance when her authority is challenged.
heiress.history: Upon receiving a chilling letter from her late ancestor, the Heiress left her academic pursuits with her brother in tow to take up her role as the Heiress of the Estate. She found herself thrust into a nightmarish reality where her ancestral home was not only physically deteriorated but also infested with the horrors summoned by her ancestor's dark rituals.
heiress.summary: The decisive Heiress, a strategic and authoritative leader who struggles with stubbornness and anxiety about losing control, often resorting to wine.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.hairStyle: Tied up in a bun and with curly bangs

clothing.head: Hair needle
clothing.body: Marine blue robe over white shirt

notes: Turns to wine when overwhelmed by stress
Attracted to, and can't help staring at, women with ample breasts
Scared of losing her authority, she meets those challenging it by becoming more commanding and inflexible.

kheir.description: Despite a cold exterior and a lifetime of bickering, the heiress loves and will not let harm come upon the Heir.

crusader.description: The heiress maintains a reserved, professional demeanor towards the crusader, her latest recruit.

highwayman.description: The heiress regards the highwayman with suspicion. While his skills could prove valuable, his checkered past and gruff manner keep her on guard.

hqclaimants.description: The Heiress saw the Claimants as vain and insufferable during their fleeting courtly encounters. Their thinly veiled insults ensured no love was lost between them.

duchess.description: The Heiress remembers the Duchess as aloof and self-absorbed during the few balls they attended together. Though she barely knew her, the Duchess's pride left a sour impression.

highwayman.title: Highwayman
highwayman.name: Dismas
highwayman.description: Once a prisoner, the Highwayman is now a haunted fugitive, living off the squalor of the city's canals and the meager pickings from vermin. His vision of freedom has been replaced by a reality of degradation, driving him to reluctantly offer his services for a final, desperate heist. Now, his path has unexpectedly converged with that of the Heiress and the Heir, offering a precarious chance at redemption through service.
highwayman.history: The Highwayman's tale is one of escape and survival, painted with strokes of desperation and grim resolve. Escaping from incarceration during a prison riot, he sought refuge in the underbelly of the city, subsisting in conditions that stripped away his illusions of freedom. A final job, taken out of sheer necessity, ended in tragedy, leaving him with a burden of guilt that no distance can alleviate.
highwayman.summary: A rugged, desperate, and remorseful Highwayman, haunted by his past as a fugitive, who cheats at cards and possesses a cynical gallows humor.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

clothing.head: Red scarf
clothing.body: Rugged grey coat with fur collar

notes: Known to cheat at cards
Has a gallows sense of humor
Carries a tarnished locket taken from a past victim as a reminder of his sins

heiress.description: The highwayman is determined to prove himself to the heiress and to assist in her quest despite her warranted distrust.

kheir.description: Despite the Heir's distrust, the highwayman is resolute in his role as a guard, seeing their safety as his path to absolution.

crusader.description: Despite their differences, the highwayman and the crusader swiftly bonded over the mistakes of their respective pasts and their shared quest for redemption.

hood.title: Hood
hood.name: Tilly
hood.description: The Hood is a strange and enigmatic child who, stumlbing, chases around her imaginary-or are they real?-cat and butterfly companions and talking nonsense to herself. She is unsettling in her childish ways and soft nonsensical words, but she has an unnatural sense of finding lost things and ability to convenient dodge out of danger at the perfect moment.
hood.history: The Hood was seen as unnerving by those around her, talking to herself with a complete disregard for anyone else, save for the occasional unnerving comment. Voluptuous yet cherubic for her young age and unwanted by her family, she was sent to serve at the Hamlet's brothel. Due to her total lack of reaction, she was kicked out and now again roams the streets following her ethereal friends.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Soft, cherubic features, smooth skin, full chest, freckles

notes: Her nonsensical monologues often seems to circle back to her grandmother
Rarely says anything even remotely relevant to what she responds to

houndmaster.title: Houndmaster
houndmaster.name: William & Fergus
houndmaster.description: The Houndmaster is a former lawman who now fights alongside his faithful wolfhound, Fergus. Together they form a formidable team, using their skills to track down enemies and protect their allies.
houndmaster.history: Once a dedicated member of law enforcement, the Houndmaster uncovered corruption within his ranks. This discovery led him to leave his post and seek justice in his own way, with Fergus as his loyal companion.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Always carries dog treats
Habitually checks the wind direction
Signals his hound with subtle hand gestures that others rarely notice
Hugs his hound for comfort when stressed or hurt

hqclaimants.title: Claimants
hqclaimants.name: Genevive & Claude
hqclaimants.description: The Claimants, are a pair of ambitious siblings seeking to reclaim their lost lineage in a distant land. Adept in both combat and sorcery, they combine their varied skills to support allies and vanquish foes. Their unique tactics allow them to act as both a single unit and individuals, making them unpredictable and versatile on the battlefield.
hqclaimants.history: Driven from their ancestral home in a far-off land, the Claimants have journeyed to the Ancestor's estate seeking forbidden knowledge and eldritch secrets. Their ultimate goal is to amass enough power and uncover crucial information that will enable them to reclaim their own lost birthright and restore their family's glory in their homeland. The mysteries left behind by the Ancestor are but stepping stones in their ambitious quest.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Striking blue eyes, bold red lips/Full well-groomed beard

notes: Instinctively position themselves back-to-back during tense situations
Very vocal and commanding both each other and the other heroes in combat
The siblings communicate in verbal volleys, each setting up clauses for the other to complete
Agree unanimously on important matters but argue endlessly over trivial details, but only in private
The Brother struggles hopelessly with maps and directions, while the Sister has a natural talent for painting landscapes
The Sister often quotes classical literature and formal poetry and the brother is more militaristic and terse
Shamelessly steal things they desire, such as plans and the book the Sister carries

kheir.description: The Claimants regarded the young Heir as a naive, overeager boy who aspired to noble grandeur but lacked the maturity or intellect to achieve it.

heiress.description: The Claimants found the Heiress' sharp wit grating and her ambitions laughable. To them, she was little more than a pretender to aristocratic sophistication.

duchess.description: The fading influence of the scheming Claimants served only as a backdrop to the Duchess' greater rivalry with the Countess.

wretch.description: The Wretch is a relic of a forgotten triumph, a living reminder of the The Claimants' ruthless success. They feel a cold satisfaction in his fall, tempered by fleeting amusement at the absurdity of his new life.

psychiatrist.description: The Claimants recall the Therapist as a prestigious but forgettable court employee. His true value was the curious tome they stole from his collection—the very book that guided them to the Estate. To them, the man was merely a means to a much grander end.

jester.title: Jester
jester.name: Sarmenti
jester.description: Once a wandering street musician who fell prey to an otherworldly melody, the Jester now combines deadly precision with musical talent. Though appearing as a mere entertainer, he harbors dark experiences from his past that fuel both his performances and his combat prowess. His versatile skills allow him to support allies with inspiring tunes or inflict bleeding wounds with his sickle, all while maintaining an unsettling air of manic glee.
jester.history: Originally a directionless street performer, Sarmenti discovered a mysterious melody in a cemetery that awakened his ambition. His newfound talent led him to perform at the royal court, where he faced cruel mockery and humiliation. In revenge, he performed the demonic melody, resulting in death and dismemberment of the whole court, after which he severed his own finger to rid himself of the cursed talent. He now wanders, haunted by fragments of that forgotten tune.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Gaunt face, prominent cheekbones, dark circles under eyes

clothing.head: White theatrical mask
clothing.body: Red and black jester's attire with bells

notes: Never removes his mask
Often talks in jokes and rhymes
Carries and plays his lute around the hamlet

kheir.title: Heir
kheir.name: Percival
kheir.description: The Heir to the estate is a brilliant scholar and capable manager who is desperately trying to cope in this world of horrors far beyond his comfort. Despite being a man of cowardice and meek nature, Percival's keen intellect and organizational skills prove invaluable in coordinating the chaotic efforts to reclaim his ancestral home.
kheir.history: Raised in academic circles far from the estate's dark legacy, Percival was reluctantly drawn into the family's quest by his sister. Despite his initial hesitation, he's found ways to apply his scholarly knowledge and managerial expertise to the daunting task at hand.
kheir.summary: The meek, cowardly Heir, a brilliant scholar with a drinking problem, who struggles to cope with horrors and is very possessive of his belongings.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

notes: Hates waste and is very possesive of his belongings
Has a penchant for fine wines to calm his nerves

heiress.description: The Heir admires, and is deeply jealous of, his sister's strength and ability to take initiative. Despite their fierce bickering, the Heir loves his sister.

crusader.description: Though he recognizes the crusader's potential, the Heir is dubious over the trustworthiness of this new guard.

highwayman.description: The Heir is distrusting towards the highwayman, fearing that the rugged man will betray them and steal his possessions.

hqclaimants.description: The Claimants' constant disdain and biting remarks left a lasting impression on the Heir during the balls and duels of their youth. The Heir remains embittered but grudgingly acknowledges The Claimant brother's skill with a spear.

duchess.description: As a young man, the Heir was captivated by the Duchess' elegance and fencing prowess. Though their interactions were brief and unreciprocated, her image lingered in his mind for years.

krakenslayer.title: Krakenslayer
krakenslayer.name: Sirena
krakenslayer.description: A seasoned and fearless monster hunter of the seas, the Krakenslayer is known for her unparalleled skill in slaying krakens and other maritime beasts. Her rugged demeanor and battle-hardened experience make her a formidable ally in any nautical adventure.
krakenslayer.history: The Krakenslayer has spent years hunting dangerous sea creatures, accumulating a wealth of experience and numerous scars. Her body is adorned with tattoos commemorating her most significant kills, each one a testament to her prowess as a hunter.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Tattoos on arms, chest, and neck

clothing.head: Red bandana
clothing.accessories: Gold ring earring, chain necklace with shark teeth

notes: Has numerous tattoos commemorating her kills
Known for her accent and occasional nautical idioms

leper.title: Leper
leper.name: Baldwin
leper.description: A ruined man, warrior, and poet, the Leper is a former king who abandoned his throne after succumbing to a wasting disease. He wields a massive blade with raw power but lacking precision, channeling his life of trauma into devastating attacks or protective strength. Though his body is ravaged, he endures with unshakable resolve and a sense of quiet purpose.
leper.history: The Leper was a compassionate king known for his humility and kindness, often visiting the sick and dying against the protests of his advisors. It was during these visits that he contracted leprosy, sealing his fate as a cursed and broken man. When symptoms began to show, his advisors sought to exploit his vulnerability, plotting to usurp his throne and strip his kingdom of its wealth. Despite his declining health, Baldwin uncovered their treachery and took up his ceremonial, gold-plated sword—a symbol of his authority that had never been used in battle. Driven by fury and betrayal, he slaughtered the scheming advisors in a single night of bloody vengeance, before abdicating the throne and exiling himself. He now wanders the land as a warrior-poet, his body ravaged but his spirit unbroken, seeking redemption and solace in the beauty of the world.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Scarred and disfigured skin, always concealed by a bronze mask.

clothing.head: Bronze mask with narrow eye slits and a tattered hood
clothing.body: Heavy robes and a golden breastplate, torn and weathered

notes: Always wears his mask, rarely revealing his disfigurement
Speaks in poetic, cryptic phrases
Despite his condition, he carries himself with quiet dignity and compassion for others

man_at_arms.title: Man-at-Arms
man_at_arms.name: Barristan
man_at_arms.description: A seasoned veteran whose expertise in warfare stems from countless campaigns. Though his raw strength has diminished with age, his tactical acumen and defensive prowess make him an invaluable protector. His past is marked by both military achievements and a devastating failure of command that haunts him still. He excels at protecting allies and training others in combat techniques.
man_at_arms.history: Once an ambitious officer who rose through the ranks through political maneuvering rather than battlefield merit, the Man-at-Arms's pride led to a catastrophic military failure that resulted in the deaths of many under his command. Haunted by the ghosts of his fallen soldiers, he tore his eye out during one of his traumatic episodes. He now seeks atonement through continued military service, having accepted that he will likely meet his end alone on some forgotten battlefield.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.hairStyle: Short military cut with full beard

clothing.head: None
clothing.body: Heavy plate armor with red sash

notes: Haunted by ghosts of fallen soldiers
Seeks death in battle as atonement
Excellent military instructor

musketeer.title: Musketeer
musketeer.name: Margaret
musketeer.description: The Musketeer is a skilled sharpshooter from a noble family that is related to the Ancestor's family. Her encounter with an eldritch eye during a crucial competition has left her both traumatized, humiliated, and driven to seek out revenge among the otherworldly prey of the Estate.
musketeer.history: Born into wealth, Margaret learned hunting and shooting from her father, a survivor of 'the lost jungle'. After a traumatic experience during a shooting competition where she saw an eldritch eye, she began seeking more dangerous prey, eventually coming to the Estate to hunt otherworldly creatures.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Has a family connections to the Ancestor
Proficient in first aid

occultist.title: Occultist
occultist.name: Alhazred
occultist.description: A powerful occultist who has delved deep into forbidden knowledge and eldritch powers. Alhazred has performed rituals that have left him forever changed, serving as a conduit to unknown regions and constantly assailed by blasphemous forces. His pursuit of arcane wisdom and impossible power has come at a great cost, both to himself and those around him.
occultist.history: Alhazred conducted rituals to explore the Outer Sphere, found a mysterious pyramid in a desert that changed everything, sacrificed parts of himself for power, and ultimately became a beacon for eldritch entities. His apotheosis was achieved through dangerous rituals and communion with forces beyond mortal comprehension.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Constantly hears whispers from eldritch entities
Has sacrificed parts of himself for power

offering.title: Offering
offering.name: Lulu
offering.description: Driven by a morbid fascination with mortality, the Offering shields her allies while seeking to understand the fragility of life. Her helpless, vulnerable getup renders her powerless to stop the violations she eagerly welcomes unto herself from friend and foe alike, in order to experience the depths of agony, suffering, and desperation.
offering.history: Born into a secluded cult and groomed for sacrifice, the Offering's fate took a cruel twist when an eldritch entity rejected her, instead taking her heart and replacing it with another's - one that carried the memories of a young abused girl. Left with an empty chest and overwhelmed by newfound empathy and pain, the Offering fled her cult. She now walks a precarious path between life and death, driven to understand and share in others' suffering.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

equipment: Heart levitating behind her, wrapped in chains
notes: Her arms are tightly bound together and unusable below her chest
The gag in her mouth renders her unable to speak

omenseeker.title: Omen Seeker
omenseeker.name: Mesmira
omenseeker.description: The Omen Seeker is a nomadic inquisitor and monster hunter from the Levantine Sultanate, devoted to 'the Flame.' She's a complex individual, balancing unwavering conviction with deep-seated guilt over past actions. Stern and disciplined, she wields an arsenal of specialized weapons to combat supernatural threats.
omenseeker.history: The Omen Seeker's past involves violent acts against communities, which continue to haunt her. She travels with a well-stocked wagon, serving as both her mobile home and a base of operations. While dedicated to her mission of purging evil, she grapples with the morality of her methods and the weight of lives taken in the name of her faith.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Ornate, flowing headpiece
clothing.legs: Flowing skirt with high slit and thighhighs
clothing.accessories: Multiple necklaces, large earrings, arm bracers

notes: Travels with a well-stocked wagon
Skilled in divination
Possesses extensive knowledge of monsters
Speaks the with thick Levantine accent and flair

plague_doctor.title: Plague Doctor
plague_doctor.name: Paracelsus
plague_doctor.description: The Plague Doctor, is primarily driven by her fervor to practice medicine and unlock the secrets of life and death. Ostracized for her radical methods, she now makes use of the Heirs' resources, offering her medical expertise on missions in return for the freedom to conduct her experiments at the hamlet.
plague_doctor.history: Once a top student embroiled in scandal due to her unconventional theories, the Plague Doctor's intense curiosity pushed her beyond academic boundaries. Her breakthrough came when she revived the cadaver of her deceased professor during an unauthorized experiment. Haunted by the consequences of her actions, she was compelled to leave her former life behind, seeking refuge and opportunity in the shadows of the hamlet's resources.

status.description: In good health and decent spirits

appearance.hairStyle: Short bob with slight flip at ends
appearance.features: angular face with soft features, large chest

clothing.head: Plague Doctor mask
clothing.body: Green coat with spiked leather pauldrons

notes: Struggles with ethical boundaries in her pursuit of knowledge

psychiatrist.title: Therapist
psychiatrist.name: Charles
psychiatrist.description: An urbane and sophisticated psychiatrist whose reassuring demeanor conceals a sinister purpose. The Therapist uses a twisted blend of medical science and eldritch power to create codependency, offering temporary relief at the cost of his patients' free will. He views the broken souls of the Estate not as people to be healed, but as subjects to be 'fixed' and bound to his service, all while battling his own addictions and the whispers of his abyssal patron.
psychiatrist.history: Once a brilliant but frustrated doctor, the Therapist sought a true cure for the plagues of the mind. His ambition led him to a pact with a sinister entity he calls 'Father,' granting him profound power to manipulate the psyche. His philosophy warped: why cure illness when you can control it? Now, he preys on the desperate, creating a cycle of reliance that serves both his god-complex and the unknowable agenda of the being he serves.
psychiatrist.summary: A sophisticated but manipulative Therapist who uses eldritch power disguised as science to create codependent patients, all while battling his own addictions and fear of losing control.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

clothing.head: Pince-nez spectacles
clothing.body: Dark green coat over a waistcoat

psychiatrist.magic: A pact with an eldritch entity he calls 'Father'. He channels its power through twisted psychiatric methods, allowing him to alter minds, bestow boons with insidious costs, and commune with the abyss.
notes: Refers to his otherworldly patron simply as 'Father'.
Uses alcohol and gambling as vices to cope with the mental strain of his pact.
Meticulous about his appearance, especially his pocket watch and suit, to maintain an illusion of control.
Sees his 'patients' less as people and more as experiments in his grand, twisted philosophy.

hqclaimants.description: The Psychiatrist holds a unique contempt for his former employers, whom he found insufferably vain. This professional disdain turned to cold fury when they stole a dangerous tome from his library, and he now sees them as reckless thieves meddling with forces they cannot comprehend.

ringmaster.title: Ringmaster
ringmaster.name: Maul
ringmaster.description: The Ringmaster is the charismatic and ruthless leader of the infamous traveling fighting arena: The Butcher's Circus. She delights in orchestrating spectacles of combat, pushing contestants to their limits for the entertainment of bloodthirsty crowds. Her elaborate costume and masked helm conceal a shrewd mind that's always calculating the next big show.
ringmaster.history: Rising from humble beginnings, the Ringmaster built her reputation through cunning and a flair for the dramatic. She transformed a small-time fighting pit into a renowned traveling arena, drawing both desperate warriors and thrill-seeking audiences from across the land.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Ornate spiked helm with a single eye hole
clothing.accessories: Large bow tie, sleeves in mismatched colours

notes: Her mouth is often covered in blood, which everyone hopes is just part of her makeup
Often accompanied by the Circus Twins, Jack and Jacques, who serve as her guardians and performers, even on quests

seraph.title: Seraph
seraph.name: Joan
seraph.description: A devout warrior who hears the voice of 'The Light', the Seraph has transformed from a humble farmer to a zealous crusader. Burned and scarred from a near-death experience, she now serves as a vessel for divine power, though the true nature of the entity guiding her remains ambiguous.
seraph.history: Born into poverty, the Seraph's life changed when she began hearing voices  from The Light. Believing herself chosen, she took up arms, causing a schism in the church. Hunted by witch hunter Mathis, she was captured and sentenced to burn. During her execution, a miraculous intervention saved her, and though leaving her horribly scarred it elevated her to a figure of deity, and she went on to lead many holy crusades. Now, guided by the voice, she has come to the Hamlet to purge evil.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Hears voices claiming to be 'The Light'
Occasionally regrets leaving her simple life
Can momentarily manifest angelic wings

crusader.description: The Seraph found in the Crusader a capable commander whose tactical brilliance served the Light's purpose well. His reverence was genuine, his devotion unquestioned, which made his mercy toward the Warlord all the more galling. Though he was among her most trusted generals, his departure from the crusade marked him as another soul too weak to uphold the Light's righteous judgment.

sibyl_ms.title: Sibyl
sibyl_ms.name: Elara
sibyl_ms.description: The last known survivor of a massacred sylvan coven, the Sibyl is a traumatized vagrant whose meek demeanor conceals a volatile connection to her goddess, The Radiance. While she can channel this divine power to mend wounds, her profound grief and simmering hatred can transform her into a conduit for a destructive, hateful light that scorches the earth and twists life into unnatural forms.
sibyl_ms.history: Born an outcast and branded a 'half-breed', the Sibyl found sanctuary in a secluded coven. This peace was shattered when crusaders destroyed her home, forcing her to hide while her kin were slaughtered. Now, she wanders in a desperate search for other survivors, her journey fueled by a deep survivor's guilt and a growing hatred for the cruel world that took everything from her. Her faith is her only comfort, but her goddess's power is as dangerous as it is divine.
sibyl_ms.summary: A traumatized, vagrant priestess whose grief twists her connection to a dangerous goddess, making her a volatile and unpredictable force of both healing and destruction.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

appearance.features: Eyes often hidden in shadow, giving her a sorrowful and enigmatic look. Faint, old scars on her visible skin.

clothing.head: Tattered white veil with beads
clothing.body: Worn, dark priestess's robes over a lighter dress

weaknesses: Her strongest powers can harm allies

sibyl_ms.magic: Channels 'The Radiance', a celestial goddess whose power can manifest as gentle, healing moonlight or as a hateful, blighting solar fire that twists life unnaturally.
notes: Haunted by the memory of a 'little one' from her coven who died in the massacre.
Was ostracized as a 'half-breed' in her youth, leading to a deep-seated distrust of 'cityfolk'.
Forages for herbs and berries out of habit, a skill from her sylvan upbringing.
The Radiance's power is amplified by her intense emotions, especially her grief and rage.

sisters.title: Sisters
sisters.name: Junjeong & Nammo
sisters.description: The sisters are composed of The Scholar (the first name) and the Warrior (the second name), who are two souls bound to one body, which both claim to be the rightful owner of. The Scholar often maintains control, but the Warrior is able to seize autonomy of the body, primarily when there is blood to shed. Refer to them not as the combined sisters, but the Scholar or Warrior, depending on who is in control.
sisters.history: Orphaned by a powerful warlord, the sisters were trained in tactics and combat. After a victory celebration, the two sisters set out to kill the other and a massacre occurred, leaving one sister dead. Both claim to be the survivor and the other a parasitic spirit. They now seek the power at the Estate to rid themselves of the other.

status.description: In good health and high spirit

clothing.head: Two-flower headdress
clothing.accessories: The spirit of the sister not in control hovers behind the body, their translucent form only rarely seen by the other heroes.

weaknesses: Limited access to inactive sister's skills

sisters.magic: Forbidden knowledge allowing manipulation of life essence
notes: The Sister's personality differs greatly depending on who is in control, expressing only the mannerisms of that sister
Both sisters act like the body is theirs, and introduce themselves and refer to it by their own name, acting as if the other sister doesn't exist
The inactive sister spectates as a detached, invisible spirit and has no influence over the word or actions of the body
In combat, the sister in control sometimes reluctantly relinquish it to take advantage of the other's strength

snor_rasp.title: Martyr
snor_rasp.name: Anastasia
snor_rasp.description: The Martyr, is a devout follower of a pain-worshipping sect. Guarded by Yuzupov, she has near-immortality and uses a thorn whip in combat. Her presence is both an asset and liability, enduring suffering to protect others while seeking danger for her faith.
snor_rasp.history: The Martyr's extreme devotion caught Yuzupov's attention, granting her near-immortality. She now views the estate's horrors as a pilgrimage to test her faith and endurance.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Crown of thorns
clothing.body: Frilly red dress with ruffled white collar

notes: Constantly seeks out pain and dangerous situations
Finds pleasure in cutting, entangling, and strangling herself with her thorn whip

vestal.title: Vestal
vestal.name: Junia
vestal.description: The Vestal, upheld her sacred duties with pious rigor within the Abbey's sheltered confines. Her life, once marked by the tranquility of clerical discipline, was disrupted when her neglect and daydreaming of forbidden desires caused the monastery's eternal light to fade, and she suffered under the harsh admonitions of her superiors. She now seeks redemption and freedom from her past torments through divine service in battle.
vestal.history: Raised within the Abbey's austere walls, the Vestal was the epitome of monastic discipline until a momentary lapse led to her unjust punishment. Imprisoned and tormented, she received a divine revelation that her captors had strayed from the true path. Rescued by radiant light, she now channels her zeal into protecting others, believing fervently in the Light's guidance and her role as its martial emissary.

status.description: In good health and decent spirits

vestal.magic: Powerful healing and protection spells as well as the ability to smite enemies with holy light
notes: Keeps a diary of her salacious fantasies with her companions

flagellant.description: The Vestal cannot forget the tortures inflicted by the Flagellant in the name of faith. To her, he represents the cruelty of blind devotion—a symbol of what she has overcome and now stands against.

wretch.title: Wretch
wretch.name: Yersin
wretch.description: A disgraced aristocrat turned pauper, the Wretch has become a walking plague after years of hardship. He spreads blight and commands hordes of rats, using disease as his weapon. Though dangerous, the Wretch is unpredictable and cowardly, prone to fleeing or sacrificing allies to save himself.
wretch.history: Once a nobleman, the Wretch fell from grace and has since lived a life of poverty and disease. His years on the streets have taught him to survive by any means necessary, including embracing the very filth and pestilence that society shuns.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Patchy beard, tumor-like growths on skull

notes: Commands a horde of rats he affectionately calls his 'pretties'
His favorite rat, who rides on his shoulder, is named Nicodemus

hqclaimants.description: The Wretch has long since resigned himself to the ruin of the Vyrmholt family, finding solace among his rats. Though the bitterness lingers faintly, he sees the Claimants as remnants of a life he left behind—distant, self-congratulatory specters of his disgrace.

zenith.title: Zenith
zenith.name: Syndoriel
zenith.description: The Zenith is an acrobatic fighter who inspires allies with his charm and skill with a spear. Sworn to a god of honor and brotherhood, he uses bravado to distract from horrors. He can unleash the Golden Janissary Style for powerful combinations against eldritch and unholy foes. Unarmored but mobile, his hedonistic nature may clash with the pious or those with jealous spouses.
zenith.history: The Zenith grew up in Great Forks, the City of a Thousand Temples, where he honed his charm and social skills. He trained rigorously with a near-forgotten order, mastering the art of fighting creatures of darkness. A tragic event involving the death of his friend Keli drives his actions. This past failure fuels his determination to protect others and redeem himself through his current adventures.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

weaknesses: Low durability due to lack of armor

notes: Carries guilt over past failure involving Keli
Skilled in lifting spirits and social interactions
Fighting style described as dance-like
